cz.cuni.mff.d3s.trupple.language.runtime.graphics

Class PascalGraphMode

  • java.lang.Object
    • cz.cuni.mff.d3s.trupple.language.runtime.graphics.PascalGraphMode

  • public class PascalGraphMode
extends java.lang.Object
    Representation of Turbo Pascal's graph mode. It contains a PascalGraphFrame, which is a GUI windows into which all the graphic content is drawn.
